explanation: [0-0] Inside a room, a plump woman in a blue shirt and blue jeans stands on the left, while a man in a yellow shirt and blue jeans stands on the right. They look at each other, bathed in pink light. Several people stand in the background, and the gray artistic English caption "Fabiosa" appears at the bottom.

[0-3] First, the woman in the blue shirt and the man in the yellow shirt sway their bodies. The woman laughs and raises her right arm high, causing the side of her shirt to split open. The man glances at it with wide eyes and then turns his head to the right. The woman lowers her arm, crosses her hands under her armpits, and stares straight ahead, her eyes wide. In the background, the other people continue to dance.

[3-12] Then the scene cuts to a blue shirt lying flat on a pink platform. A right hand holds scissors, cutting the left side of the shirt. The camera zooms in on a pair of hands using a tape measure. Then, they pick up a colorful silk scarf and place it over the cut section of the blue shirt. The scene cuts back to the room where the woman in the blue shirt now has a colorful silk scarf sewn onto the side of her shirt. The man in the yellow shirt walks from the right to her left, and they dance back-to-back. The people in the background also continue dancing.

[12-15] Next, the scene shifts to a bar. A man in a blue shirt and blue jeans sits on the right side of the bar, while a woman in a white top and red skirt sits facing forward on a stool to his left. There is a shelf on the red wall with blue-green light strips around its frame. The shelf holds a green plant and some decorations. The back of the woman's red skirt splits open. The man in the blue shirt glances at it and laughs, covering his mouth with his fist. The woman in the red skirt glances back, covering the ripped part of her skirt with her right hand, before turning back to the front.

[15-25] The scene then switches to a red skirt spread out on a blue platform. A right hand holds scissors, cutting upwards from the middle of the skirt while a left hand holds the bottom of the skirt. The scene changes to a sewing machine stitching a piece of red fabric. The scene cuts again to a black hole puncher punching a hole in the red fabric from the right. A right hand then pushes an eyelet into the hole. The scene cuts again to show the red fabric with eyelets lining both sides. A pair of hands place a brown strip of fabric on top of the red fabric. The scene cuts once more, showing the brown fabric placed down the center of the red fabric, followed by a black ribbon crisscrossing over the eyelets.
